      • getGraph

        @GetMapping("/api/chord/graph")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Graph> getGraph​(@Nullable @RequestParam(value="resultGraphIri",required=false)
                                                               @Nullable java.lang.String graphIri)
                                                        throws LpAppsException
        Retrieve an object representing an RGML Graph entity from the RDF named graph graphIri.
        Parameters:
        graphIri - the RDF named graph to retrieve the RGML Graph from
        Returns:
        an RGML Graph
        Throws:
        LpAppsException - if the retrieval fails for any reason

      • getNodes

        @GetMapping("/api/chord/nodes")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Node>> getNodes​(@Nullable @RequestParam(value="resultGraphIri",required=false)
                                                                              @Nullable java.lang.String graphIri,
                                                                              @Nullable @RequestParam(value="limit",required=false)
                                                                              @Nullable java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                              @Nullable @RequestParam(value="offset",required=false)
                                                                              @Nullable java.lang.Integer offset)
                                                                       throws LpAppsException
        Retrieve RGML Nodes belonging to a particular RGML Graph from the RDF named graph graphIri. Pagination is supported with parameters limit and offset.
        Parameters:
        graphIri - the RDF named graph to retrieve the RGML Nodes from
        limit - the limit of the results (maximum amount of nodes to display)
        offset - the offset of the results (amount of nodes to skip)
        Returns:
        a list of retrieved nodes
        Throws:
        LpAppsException - if the retrieval fails for any reason

      • getEdges

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Edge>> getEdges​(@Nullable @RequestParam(value="resultGraphIri",required=false)
                                                                              @Nullable java.lang.String graphIri)
                                                                       throws LpAppsException
        Throws:
        LpAppsException

      • getMatrix

        @PostMapping("/api/chord/matrix")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<double[][]> getMatrix​(@Nullable @RequestParam(value="resultGraphIri",required=false)
                                                                     @Nullable java.lang.String graphIri,
                                                                     @RequestParam("useWeights")
                                                                     boolean useWeights,
                                                                     @Nullable @RequestBody
                                                                     @Nullable java.util.List<java.lang.String> nodeUris)
                                                              throws LpAppsException
        Retrieve a matrix of Edge weights in an RGML Graph. The order of weights follows the order of the RGML Nodes which would be returned by a call to getNodes(String, Integer, Integer).
        Parameters:
        graphIri - the RDF named graph to retrieve the RGML Nodes from
        useWeights - TODO probably remove this parameter, as we don't use it
        nodeUris - if not null, only returns a matrix for Edges between the given Nodes
        Returns:
        a matrix of weights
        Throws:
        LpAppsException - if the retrieval fails for any reason
